menu.desc: 100% Beef or Chicken Burgers, Served with Fries

items.name: Cali BBQ
items.desc: Get a taste of sunny California! Tuck into a flame-grilled Super patty, topped with American cheese, fresh slices of tomato and crisp lettuce, and finished with a zesty BBQ sauce and golden crispy onions.

items.name: Cali BBQ Double
items.desc: Get a taste of sunny California! Tuck into two flame-grilled Super patties, topped with American cheese, fresh slices of tomato and crisp lettuce, and finished with a swirl of zesty BBQ sauce and golden crispy onions.

items.name: Cali Chicken BBQ
items.desc: Get a taste of sunny California! A zesty BBQ sauce on a juicy Chicken Super patty, topped with two slices of American cheese, fresh tomato slices, crisp lettuce, and a scatter of golden crispy onions.

items.name: Super
items.desc: A flame-grilled beef patty, topped with tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, mayo, pickles, a swirl of ketchup and sliced onions on a soft sesame seed bun.

items.name: Double Super
items.desc: Two flame- grilled beef patties topped with juicy tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, mayo, pickles, white onions and a swirl of ketchup on a soft sesame seed bun.

items.name: Super Chicken, Bacon & Cheese
items.desc: Toasted long sesame bun with crispy chicken, lettuce, creamy mayo, melted cheese and crispy bacon.

items.name: MEGA Double Cheese Burger and Bacon
items.desc: Two flame- grilled beef patties topped with Applewood smoked bacon and American cheese, all in our toasted sesame seed bun.

items.name: Super Chicken
items.desc: Tasty chicken wrapped in a special crisp coating, topped with iceberg lettuce, creamy mayo and crowned with a toasted sesame seed bun.

items.name: Double Cheese Burger and Bacon
items.desc: Two signature flame-grilled beef patties topped with smoked bacon and two layers of melted American cheese on a toasted sesame seed bun.

menu.desc: Vegan and Plant- Based Burgers, Served with Fries

items.name: Plant-Based Cheese Burger and Bakon
items.desc: A flame-grilled Plant-based Super® patty in our classic Super® bun, layered with slices of smooth Vegan Cheeeze and strips of Vegan Bakon, topped with egg-free mayo and ketchup. It's big, plant-based flavour. Plant-based Bakon King is plant-based, however it is cooked on the same broiler as our Super® to deliver the same unique flame-grilled taste.

items.name: Plant-Based Double Cheese Burger and Bakon
items.desc: Two juicy flame-grilled Plant-based Super patties in a soft sesame bun, layered with four slices of smooth Vegan Cheeeze and crispy Vegan Bakon, topped with egg-free mayo and ketchup. It's big, plant-based flavour. Plant-based Bakon King is plant-based, however it is cooked on the same broiler as our Super to deliver the same unique flame-grilled taste.

items.name: Plant-Based Super
items.desc: A Flame-grilled Plant-based burger, topped with tomatoes, fresh cut lettuce, vegan mayo, pickles, a swirl of ketchup, and sliced onions on a soft sesame seed bun. The Plant-based Super is plant-based, however it is cooked on the same broiler as our original Super to deliver the same unique flame-grilled taste.

items.name: Vegan Super Chicken, Bakon & Cheese
items.desc: Our famous Vegan Super patty nestled in a soft sesame bun, topped with sizzling Vegan Bakon, two slices of smooth Vegan Cheeeze, and drizzled with egg-free mayo and ketchup. It's 100% tasty, 100% Vegan.

items.name: Vegan Super Chicken
items.desc: Tasty chicken wrapped in a special crisp coating, topped with iceberg lettuce, creamy mayo and crowned with a toasted sesame seed bun.

menu.desc: Side dishes for when you need something extra

items.name: Chilli Chicken Fries
items.desc: 6 Strips of 100% juicy chicken breast, breaded with crushed Doritos© tortilla chips to create the perfect crunch, and dusted with the iconic and bold Doritos© Chilli Heatwave flavour.

items.name: 6 Chicken Nuggets
items.desc: Bite-sized Chicken Nuggets, coated in a crispy tempura. Served with our BK dip.

items.name: 6 Vegan Nuggets
items.desc: Certified by the Vegan Society®- Vegan Nuggets served with a dip of your choice

items.name: 6 Chilli Cheese Bites
items.desc: Crispy coated with smooth and spicy cheese inside. A unique taste of chilli with every bite.

items.name: 6 Onion Rings
items.desc: Classic golden onion rings
